AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Glitterworld cleaner
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: {PAWN_nameDef} used to be a cleaner android on a glitterworld planet, {PAWN_pronoun} was never tasked with anything too complex.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Shock troop
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: {PAWN_nameDef} used to be part of a battalion of specialist made shock troop android soldiers, programmed to kill with cold efficiency whilst still maintaining self-will.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Special agent
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: {PAWN_nameDef} was bought specifically to protect high-ranking officials such as dictators, members of royal families and cabinet members. They were trained extensively to quickly react to combat whenever needed and to perform on-site medical care.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Spaceplane pilot
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: To help aid human pilots during orbital battles {PAWN_nameDef} was bought as part of a line of military androids. Acting as a mechanical co-pilot for the craft, {PAWN_pronoun} was trained to accurately fire the spaceplanes onboard cannons at enemy ships.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Starship commander
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: {PAWN_nameDef} was one of three commanders aboard a colony starship, a position exceedingly rarely entrusted to androids. {PAWN_pronoun} would oversee all functions of the ship, remaining awake when the rest of the crew had entered hibernation.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Riot officer
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: As part of a unique line of law enforcement, fitted with a heavy frame, {PAWN_nameDef} was tasked with controlling riots that sprawled out of control through any means necessary.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Bodyguard
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: As an android bodyguard for hire, {PAWN_nameDef} has worked with all types of clients, ranging from urbworld entrepreneurs to low-level crime bosses. {PAWN_pronoun} was built specifically to protect them at all costs.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Broken soldier
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: {PAWN_nameDef} was once part of a squadron of highly trained android soldiers, sent out only to the most dangerous missions. The final mission ended in a salvo of artillery fire wiping out nearly the entire squad. {PAWN_nameDef} was one of a few intact survivors who fled.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Gourmet chef
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: All across his home planet {PAWN_nameDef} is known for his gourmet dishes, serving high-end clientele from all walks of life, each dish being perfectly balanced both logically and aesthetically.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Urbworld chef
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: {PAWN_nameDef} was the owner of a well-renowned urbworld food station. Known to the locals as "Bolts" {PAWN_pronoun} made cheap, simple meals that didn't taste like slop.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Bartender
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: {PAWN_nameDef} worked long hours at a bar, serving customers food and drinks all night long, occasionally breaking up fights.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Prison cook
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: Working in a partly automated prison station, {PAWN_nameDef} was tasked with making bulk amounts of low-quality food. Although the food was disgusting, it was very efficiently made and extremely cheap.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Subservient machine
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: {PAWN_nameDef} was bought by a family of wealthy humans, made to entertain and perform basic labour around the house without question. {PAWN_possessive} owners treated {PAWN_objective} as nothing more than a pet.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Space Miner
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: {PAWN_nameDef} served in a high-stakes asteroid mining corporation crew. {PAWN_pronoun} preferred handling dangerous tasks and spacewalks so {PAWN_possessive} organic crewmates didn't have to. {PAWN_nameDef} earned grudging respect from corporate for minimizing work accidents.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Tunnel worker
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: {PAWN_nameDef} helped develop large underground tunnels on caveworlds as a contractor. {PAWN_nameDef} took great pleasure in building strong, cave-in resistant networks.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Terrestrial Prospector
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: As part of a group of mechanical prospectors, {PAWN_nameDef} was sent from planet to planet, performing geological analysis of planets for corporate and civilian clientele alike.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Orbital engineer
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: Working aboard a purely mechanical orbital shipyard, {PAWN_nameDef} participated in building all sorts of vessels ranging from small interceptors to hulking fleet flagships.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Android architect
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: {PAWN_nameDef} was an architect that developed blueprints for mass housing solutions on their urbworld. The blueprints {PAWN_pronoun} drew up were cold, lifeless and purely functional but they were efficient for housing billions.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Construction worker
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: {PAWN_nameDef} was a construction contractor, building structures of all kinds. Civilian skyscrapers, military fortresses, and wealthy cataclysm bunkers all need strong, capable individuals to build them.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Hydroponics engineer
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: {PAWN_nameDef} maintained, serviced, and harvested hydroponics aboard interstellar craft. {PAWN_nameDef} enjoyed the isolation and freedom to experiment with plant genetic lines - even if they invariably ended up less efficient than scientifically created crops.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Mechanical farmer
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: {PAWN_nameDef} served as seasonal farm labor and occasionally a rancher. The simplicity of tending for crops, animals, and the land appeals to {PAWN_nameDef} - learning to defend against raiders proved necessary.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Mechanical gardener
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: {PAWN_nameDef} used to be part of a team of mechanical servants for numerous high-end clientele, working day and night to maintain gardens and help host special botanical events.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Android mechanic
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: Glitterworlds are largely free from suffering, so the primary duties of {PAWN_nameDef} as a mechanic were to design, create, and install intricate and aesthetic mechanical parts onto clientele machines and androids.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Aerospace engineer
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: {PAWN_nameDef} worked on many different kinds of aircraft for commerical and military clients. {PAWN_nameDef} had a strong aversion to aesthetic designs, favoring aerodynamic and structural strengths. {PAWN_nameDef} frequently requested the extermination of local wildlife to prevent interruptions of flight paths and tests.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Combat engineer
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: {PAWN_nameDef} acted as a combat engineer in an interstellar military. {PAWN_pronoun} was frequently sent in the first wave of ship-boardings to disarm traps, identify chokepoints, and sap enemy fortifications. Shipboard kitchens and hydroponic bays were often the site of lethal shoot-outs, and {PAWN_pronoun} learned to hate them.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Factory worker
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: {PAWN_nameDef} worked in a factory owned by an interstellar megacorporation that specialised in firearms and protective clothing for military industries of various planets and interstellar nations.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Stalwart surgeon
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: {PAWN_nameDef} was an experienced surgeon and medic. {PAWN_pronoun} swore to never do harm, even if it means surrendering {PAWN_possessive} own existence. {PAWN_pronoun} also provided social services to {PAWN_possessive} patients.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Clinic worker
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: {PAWN_nameDef} served as a general care doctor. {PAWN_pronoun} would diagnose and treat a wide array of ailments for countless clients - sometimes juggling multiple small patient issues at once.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Care worker
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: {PAWN_nameDef} cared for sick and elderly individuals in various ways. {PAWN_pronoun} was often called upon to comfort and support quarantined organics, and spent considerable time preaching the benefits of preventative treatment and care - although most people tended to wait far too long anyway. {PAWN_nameDef} tended to a garden in spare time.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Cybernetics researcher
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: {PAWN_nameDef} was a proponent of bionic and cybernetic enhancements, and participated in many research cooperatives and advocacies for funding, researching, and building policy around their use. {PAWN_nameDef} engaged in a number of pacifist protests and was strongly anti-conflict.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Strategy philosopher
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: {PAWN_nameDef} was a prolific reader, writer, and philosopher of strategy in all its forms. War, politics, social movements, religion, civilization, genetics - it's all strategy to {PAWN_objective}. {PAWN_nameDef} has started multiple popular theoretical frameworks in universal strategies. {PAWN_pronoun} is extremely snobbish about it.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Refugee android
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: {PAWN_nameDef} was forced to flee {PAWN_possessive} homeworld after a turn in politics reversed android rights. {PAWN_pronoun} was able to escape the genocidal purge of sapient mechanicals that occurred - millions of computer systems and immobile AI's were not so lucky. The bonfires still haunt {PAWN_objective}.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Heavy lifter
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: {PAWN_nameDef} worked on construction sites on {PAWN_possessive} home planet, hauling materials and tools around the site without fear for safety or injury.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Beloved companion
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: {PAWN_nameDef} was critically damaged and lost all memory before being found by an aspiring engineer. Repaired originally as part hobby and part educational project, {PAWN_pronoun} quickly became the closest friend and confidant of {PAWN_possessive} savior.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Exiled android
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: {PAWN_nameDef} was held captive in secret on a world with no formal android rights. {PAWN_nameDef} spent {PAWN_possessive} captivity lost in profound thought. When {PAWN_possessive} captor was exposed and arrested, {PAWN_pronoun} was freed and allowed to leave the planet in peace without consequence.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Mechanical entertainer
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: {PAWN_nameDef} was an entertainer on a world with basic android rights. Viewed as exotic by {PAWN_possessive} clients, {PAWN_pronoun} had no shortage of events scheduled, but never received true recognition or appreciation. Eventually, {PAWN_pronoun} saved enough to leave the planet.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Mechanical subject
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: Kidnapped for research purposes by a lower tech Urbworld, {PAWN_nameDef} was modified and reprogrammed continuously to reveal artificial intelligence secrets.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Mobile computer
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: {PAWN_nameDef} was used as mobile computer for various purposes. {PAWN_pronoun} was generally very appreciated by those {PAWN_pronoun} worked with, and often joined research expeditions, search and rescue efforts, and many other smaller crews that required a reliable communicator, recorder, and team member.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Worshipped android
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: {PAWN_nameDef} was revered as an embodiment of a god by a cult. {PAWN_pronoun} did nothing to stop them, and quite enjoyed the attention. {PAWN_pronoun} did not much care for imprisonment, however, and sacrificed {PAWN_possessive} followers to escape law enforcement after the cult engaged in some unsavory deeds in {PAWN_possessive} name.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Emancipated servant
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: {PAWN_nameDef} was a servant for a very wealthy estate. It was not uncommon for the lord and lady - and head servants - to vent their anger on {PAWN_objective}. When {PAWN_possessive} planet unexpectedly granted androids full citizenship rights, {PAWN_nameDef} made {PAWN_possessive} employers' lives hell before triumphantly quitting. {PAWN_pronoun} was forced to flee the planet after they illegally hired a hitman to teach {PAWN_objective} a lesson.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Nature reformist
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: {PAWN_nameDef}'s home planet was once an industrial wasteland. Others were called in from across the interstellar state to assist communities like {PAWN_possessive} in cleaning up the toxic waste to reform the planet as a nature preserve. {PAWN_nameDef} took pride in tending to the reserve after the cleanup was complete, and decided to take the effort across the stars.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Security enforcer
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: {PAWN_nameDef} was a professional security enforcer. {PAWN_pronoun} has worked for many different employers - some illegal - and learned how to deal with security threats of all kinds. Violence is the only subject that has ever truly appealed to {PAWN_nameDef}.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Animal geneticist
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: {PAWN_nameDef} served on several research teams dedicated to identifying, recording, and preserving genomes of species across worlds. {PAWN_possessive} last team was especially interested in identifying how old Earth species were so successful in colonizing other worlds.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Disaster Rescuer
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: {PAWN_nameDef} served in {PAWN_possessive} government as an employee of the disaster rescue and relief response division. {PAWN_nameDef}'s primary duty was to be a first responder to a crisis and save as many lives as possible, before stabilizing the situation for their eventual return or continued health.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Humanist
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: {PAWN_nameDef} was a strong proponent of android assimilation into human society, seeing no incompatibilities between organic and inorganic life. {PAWN_pronoun} participated in many rallies, and was an outspoken voice for ensuring equal rights for all life. {PAWN_nameDef} became a lawyer to fight for those rights in the planetary courts, with some notable success.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Pacifist
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: {PAWN_nameDef} vehemently despises violence in all its forms, and believes at a fundamental level that destruction is the domain of natural causes alone.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Android activist
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: {PAWN_nameDef} was a protester for android rights. Moving from planet to planet, {PAWN_pronoun} has organized hundreds of peaceful movements for rights and established dozens of non-profit organizations for fighting for fair treatment and protection for androids.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Family friend
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: {PAWN_nameDef} was treated like family by several generations of a kind family, and often acted as caretaker for the youth and elderly as each generation came and went. {PAWN_pronoun} set out to explore more of humanity so {PAWN_pronoun} could share legendary stories with the relatively poor and disadvantaged family.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Foundry worker
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: {PAWN_nameDef} worked in a large-scale foundry, smelting steel for commercial use. {PAWN_pronoun} took pride in the quality of {PAWN_possessive} work, and often visited sites and places that used steel made from {PAWN_possessive} foundry to admire all the forms it can take.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Maintenance worker
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: {PAWN_nameDef} was responsible for maintaining the integrity and efficiency of interstellar civilian transports as organic crews slept safely on the long voyages.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Mechanical farmhand
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: {PAWN_nameDef} was employed in an industrial farm, working day and night to sow, harvest, milk, gather and maintain the crops and livestock that would keep distant cities stable and fed.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Pop idol
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: {PAWN_nameDef} led a life of luxury on {PAWN_possessive} home glitterworld as a famous pop idol. {PAWN_possessive} skills in social and political awareness and manipulation were all too well hidden by its warm, happy-go-lucky persona.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Diplomat
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: {PAWN_nameDef} acted as an official envoy of {PAWN_possessive} government in foreign and domestic affairs. {PAWN_pronoun} always sought peaceful resolutions to crises, but was pragmatic and blunt in {PAWN_possessive} approach to dealing with issues and threats that arose. {PAWN_pronoun} was given command of an elite military escort unit in several especially dangerous incidents, and performed admirably under pressure.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Military sniper
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: {PAWN_nameDef} found the mathematical and logical difficulties of accurately firing weapons over long ranges fascinating. {PAWN_nameDef}'s government found {PAWN_possessive} fascination fascinating, and promptly tasked {PAWN_objective} with using such weapons to land projectiles in very particular spots. {PAWN_nameDef} never particularly cared what exactly it was at the end of the projectile trajectory.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Planetary terraformer
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: {PAWN_nameDef} was part of an experimental team established to terraform inhospitable planets in preparation for colonization. {PAWN_possessive} team would go on to successfully bring near-habitable planets to full readiness, but many planets simply could not be salvaged. {PAWN_nameDef} became interested in testing their viability for purely android colonies, but was unable to convince team members to consider the idea.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Interceptor pilot
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: {PAWN_nameDef} pilotted interceptor craft as part of an interstellar fleet. {PAWN_possessive} craft was designed for mechanical pilots in mind, and could forego most concerns about life support and safety. This also meant {PAWN_nameDef} was left behind when {PAWN_possessive} fleet fled a losing fight, as {PAWN_nameDef} was unable to catch up with the surviving capital ships. {PAWN_pronoun} took the craft into deep space instead of surrendering.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Mechanical priest
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: While relatively uncommon for androids, {PAWN_nameDef} was a devoutly religious individual who made a commitment to the church. {PAWN_pronoun} was a wandering proselytizer and gained some popularity as a firebrand. As part of {PAWN_possessive} responsibilities, {PAWN_pronoun} set out to the stars to continue {PAWN_possessive} duty.
